div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:53 am CDT

div.div: Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 65. Breezy, with a north northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
Clear, with a low around 37. North wind 10 to 15 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 77. West wind 5 to 15 mph becoming south in the morning.
